lead_paragraph: The bear, named Pizza, is showing signs of distress, advocates say, adding that using wild animals to attract customers is a disturbing trend in China.

headline.print_headline: The ‘Saddest’ Polar Bear Lives in a Mall in China
headline.main: The ‘Saddest’ Polar Bear Lives in a Mall in China

snippet: The bear, named Pizza, is showing signs of distress, advocates say, adding that using wild animals to attract customers is a disturbing trend in China....
abstract: Chinese animal welfare advocates call on Guangdong Province government to remove polar bear named Pizza from Grandview Mall in Guangzhou, where he is among hundreds of wild animals on display; say bear is victim of national trend in which wild animals are used to draw customers to shopping centers.
